copy.default_share_language: See the latest Sunday morning talk show guests
copy.chatter: For politicians and journalists alike, an appearance on one of the weekly Sunday talk shows confers a certain status inside the Beltway. USA TODAY is keeping score, tracking who’s most in demand week-to-week on the Sunday talk show circuit.
copy.contact_chatter: Questions about Sunday show appearances? Contact
